applicant-name.name: LIMING BEIJING ENERGY SAVING TECH CO LTD
力明（北京）节能科技有限公司

invention-title: Water electrolysis hydrogen production collecting tank
一种水电解制氢收集罐

abstract.p: The invention discloses a water electrolysis hydrogen production collection tank, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen collection, the water electrolysis hydrogen production collection tank comprises a protection tank and a gas collection tank, the gas collection tank is installed in the protection tank and is fixed through a fixing rod, the protection tank is provided with a gas pressure meter for measuring the gas pressure of a cavity between the protection tank and the gas collection tank, and the gas pressure meter is connected with the gas collection tank. The outer side of the protection tank is sleeved with a first positioning ring and a second positioning ring, the first positioning ring and the second positioning ring are connected through a plurality of connecting mechanisms, the two sides of each connecting mechanism are slidably connected with lifting mechanisms, and an arc-shaped rod is installed between every two adjacent lifting mechanisms; and a translation block is slidably connected into each arc-shaped rod, the translation blocks temporarily seal the damaged part of the protection tank, and loss caused by the fact that a large amount of hydrogen overflows is prevented.

本发明公开了一种水电解制氢收集罐，涉及氢气收集技术领域，包括保护罐和集气罐，所述集气罐安装在所述保护罐内并通过固定杆进行固定，所述保护罐上安装有测量所述保护罐与所述集气罐之间空腔气压的气压表，所述保护罐外侧套设有第一定位环和第二定位环，所述第一定位环和所述第二定位环通过若干连接机构连接，每个所述连接机构两侧滑动连接有升降机构，相邻的两个所述升降机构之间安装有弧形杆，每个所述弧形杆内滑动连接有平移块，所述平移块对所述保护罐破损处进行临时密封，防止氢气大量溢出，造成损失。
